header.title: Millions Of Shoppers Can’t Wait To See What You Have In Store

why.title: WHY SELL ON PRICESHARE
why.description: Join a marketplace where nearly 50 million buyers around the world shop for unique items

section1.title: Low Fees
section1.description: It doesn’t take much to list your items and once you make a sale, PriceShare’s transaction fee is just 2.5%.

section2.title: Powerful Tools
section2.description: Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business.

section3.title: Support 24/7
section3.description: Our tools and services make it easy to manage, promote and grow your business.

how.title: HOW IT WORKS
how.description: Easy to start selling online on PriceShare just 4 simple steps

section1.title: Register and list your products
section1.point1: Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
section1.point2: Our PriceShare Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online

section2.title: Receive orders and sell your product
section2.point1:
Ship your orders, stress-free, whether you choose Fulfillment by PriceShare (FBP) or
PriceShare Easy Ship.
section2.point2:
Let us take care of delivering your products. You can choose to take
care of shipping yourself too by opting for self-ship.

section3.title: Package and ship with ease
section3.point1: Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
section3.point2: Our PriceShare Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online

section4.title: Package and ship with ease
section4.point1: Register your business for free and create a product catalogue. Get free training on how to run your online business
section4.point2: Our PriceShare Advisors will help you at every step and fully assist you in taking your business online

fees.title: BEST FEES TO START
fees.fee_desc: It doesn’t cost a thing to list up to 50 items a month, and you only pay after your stuff sells. It’s just a small percent of the money you earn
fees.benefit_title: Here's what you get for your fee:
fees.benefit1: A worldwide community of more than 160 million shoppers.
fees.benefit2: Shipping labels you can print at home, with big discounts on postage.
fees.benefit3: Seller protection and customer support to help you sell your stuff.
